response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to us, but its worth to you is even greater, making it a perfect match for your needs. We understand the importance of this purchase and are willing to offer you the chance to own it at a special price. Our proposal is to extend the offer at a price of $950,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value, ensuring that you receive exceptional value while allowing us to share in the appreciation of its true worth. Please let us know if this offer meets your expectations, and we look forward to the possibility of facilitating this transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
